contentList.content:
Beshaba is the goddess of accidents, bad luck, and misfortune. Sister deity to Tymora, both rose from the rotting corpse of the ancient goddess of fortunate, Tyche, during an event known as the Dawn Cataclysm.

Domains: Trickery
Alignment: Chaotic Evil

Beshaba is the goddess of accidents, bad luck, and misfortune. Sister deity to Tymora, both rose from the rotting corpse of the ancient goddess of fortunate, Tyche, during an event known as the Dawn Cataclysm.
Beshaba is the goddess of accidents, bad luck, and misfortune. Paladins of Beshaba spread her doctrine through manipulation and playing on common folks morbid fears.
